title: Multimedia-Enhanced Language Education Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A professional development program for pre-service or in-service teachers to enhance teaching competencies, focusing on creating multimedia language education content applicable in workplace environments for working adult learners.

learning_goals: Learners can design language education scenarios by integrating multimedia elements (text, images, audio, video).
Learners can develop and evaluate context-specific language learning modules using VR/simulation tools.
Learners can create language education content applicable to real-world job environments through a project-based approach.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
